post.body: Does LaBeouf have to be in every sci-fi action film out there?
Heh, I still think mine may be worse... I try not to remember those dark years though.
That'd be a good one too.
@rjurney Maybe there's a biz there for a quick reference app via Twitter. @whatis affilliate marketing (get 140 char response back)
They gotta learn sometime. The sooner they do, the more likely the rest of us have a shot at presenting our web based biz. =)
That looks pretty awesome.
Feel free to unload it here if you're looking for buyers http://www.easyautosales.com/sell-my-car
But how does one get their site added?
I will learn down the road. Right now I need specialists to fix the pot holes in my mouth. =$
Balsamiq is great for wireframing
Congrats on becoming a part of this mess. =)
you need man hands to shove that football sized lunch in your mouth.
Heh, I thought the site you posted was TOOL BAM
I'm looking for help on the email content side, not so much the delivery/execution side. =)
<facepalm>
Biz is good - despite the industry. 2009 should be very interesting. =) How's your thing going?
Damn, I wish it was a sushi day for me.
There's another Au Bon Pain in the airport... ta da =)
Sounds rad and a fun time will be had. Chad's a good lad but u sure the other won't be mad? Rhyming is such a fad. =P
The 2009 Honda Fit
The power of Twitter is weak on Christmas Eve... it'll be better on Jan 20th though. =)
If you DOget him here, please have him consider making this a hub for Virgin America as well. =)
She did get him to come to ATL once for her charity's gala. He would make a great speaker and maybe teach others to take more risks.
Fox News is showing the dangers of using IE due to the security breach yet they're showing students on Mac's. Oooookay....?
Random tech question: How many more years until we get to use SSD RAID tech for large DB servers? Also, will we need memcache then?
Gang of 5 managed to convince another to join Twitter! @pclements wants to know what you use Twitter for.
Do any of you do price comparsion shopping for dentistry?
Picking a dentist by proxmity is probably not the best idea - but I really don't have any other gauge to measure them by.
It's hard to focus on coding when the brain is in a fog. I'm determined to get our new section released by lunch though.
Retweeting @BreakingNewsOn: AP: OPEC says it will cut 2.2 million barrels a day from output. (I hope that means we cut more driving)
Yay for Mac users! 10.5.6 is out. Go grab it via software updates.
Any email campaign experts on Twitter following me?
I finally rearranged my office/guest room. Now I can proudly display my Transformers on the new shelves. Productivity improvement +0.
Nice... +1 for DC http://snurl.com/96ese
When I write programs for data entrythat's when I'm really chopped and skrewed...
Starting to cook the Thanksgiving 1.5 meal on Christmas day. I'm not really a huge fan of ham... plus we missed out on leftovers this year.
Happy Holidays everyone. Here's a message for all the entrepreneurs as we head into 2009 - http://snurl.com/93w96
Finally got the windshield repaired. At $770, that's an expensive piece of glass! Thank goodness for comp insurance.
Doing some mpg data input work for www.easyautosales.com - Hummer H2's mpg is so bad that it holds 32 gal's and GM doesn't report it.
I got my order for the free Quickbooks Pro a day after placing the order. Staples.com rocks. Now hopefully the mail in rebate won't be lost.
